Your Data is Trapped. Your Teams are Waiting.

The Executive Pain

Strategic decisions are delayed by weeks because KPIs must be manually reconciled across conflicting Excel sheets, HIS systems, and ERP databases.

The Organizational Pain

Non-technical staff—HR, Procurement, Head Nurses—cannot access data directly. They submit "tickets" to IT and wait 5+ days for simple reports.

"A Nursing Director waits 5 days for a 'Staff Overtime vs. Patient Volume' report, delaying critical rostering decisions."

The Regulatory Wall

Public cloud AI (ChatGPT, Claude, etc.) is banned for patient data under PDPL. Hospitals are left with rigid, legacy tools that can't keep up.

0%

of Saudi firms cite data privacy concerns as the #1 barrier to AI adoption

Sovereign Self-Service Intelligence

An on-premises AI analyst available 24/7 to your entire organization.

1

Ask Your Data

Natural language queries for any authorized user—from CEO to Head Nurse. No SQL. No tickets. Just answers.

100% On-Premises

Air-gapped deployment. Your data never leaves your facility. Full PDPL and NCA compliance.

3

Universal Ingestion

Connects to Excel, SQL, Oracle, HIS, ERP, HL7/FHIR—in minutes, not months.

PDPL & NCA Compliant

Role-Based Access

Users only "chat" with data they're authorized to see. HR can't access clinical records. Full RBAC.
